name: Wild Owl Flying Simulator 3D
description:
Take flight with wild owl and hunt down fast running animals in the realistic wildlife environment. It’s time to face a realistic wildlife experience of controlling a fast flying owl in a dark deadly forest. That’s not it your mission objective also includes hunting rabbits, goats and zebras. Wild owl simulator 3D brings you the real time wildlife adventure with multiple extreme forest journeys of hunt and survival.

Live the adventures life of an owl with extreme challenges to survive and to satisfy the hunger. Owl simulator brings you the real life animal’s safari which highlights the actual life of an owl. To enhance your gaming experience multiple playing modes are available with free roam mode and mission mode.

Features

- Fly the owl in 15 challenging missions
- Different animal categories to chase and hunt
- Multiple modes to match your mood
- Realistic city and forest environment with HD graphics
- Lifelike jungles background sounds
- Smooth and user friendly controls
